response.overview: California, in the middle of the gold rush in 1850. It is a time when men sold their souls for a few gold nuggets and women sold their bodies for a place to sleep. Angel expects nothing more from men than betrayal. Sold into prostitution as a child, she survives by keeping her hatred alive. And what she hates most are the men who use her, leaving her empty and dead inside. Then she meets Michael Hosea, a young man who seeks his father's heart in everything he does... Based on the novel by Francine Rivers. (FILMAFINITY)
response.title: Un Amor para Creer
